website_summaries.verdict: A pack of three genuine Intex replacement filters (Type B) for Intex's larger above-ground pool pumps.
pros: These Intex filters will work with Krystal Klear pump models 51, 51R, 520, and 520R, as well as several Intex filter and pump models
They measure 10 inches tall by 5.75 inches in diameter
cons: These filters are not that durable
With proper care, however, you should get about two weeks out of them

customer_reviews.title: same filters, a little bit cheaper
customer_reviews.text: They came quickly and fit my Coleman pool type IV filter. After going through 12 filters in 2 weeks, I decided to make my own using quilting batting from a hobby store for 7.99 and an old pair of panty hose...the green algae finally disappeared and has not returned. I just take it out every 2 days, wash it with soap and water...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Die to fast. EDIT: they work
customer_reviews.text: These go bad in a few days, they don't even look that dirty but all water flow stops within a few days. EDIT: They are more expensive than the Walmart ones BUT they do filter better even if it doesn't look like it on the filter itself. My pool won't get clear with the cheaper filter. These do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: These filters don’t last as long as my previous index ...
customer_reviews.text: These filters don’t last as long as my previous index filters, due to the hard plastic shell in the core. Previously I was able to rinse my filters off and use them longer, but with the hard plastic core it is difficult to rinse and reuse. Overall they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Zulay I.

customer_reviews.title: Stops working in 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work... within 2-3 hours filter pump has little to no water flow. Went thru 3 cartridges in a day. Now back to square 1. Unbelievable!!
customer_reviews.author: JanP

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an excellent buy. My pump uses index size B filters and they have always worked great however these filters for really tight and do not.allow the water to pass through them. I've never had this trouble before. I usually buy mine at Walmart. I guess I'll have to see if I can still find.them there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are supposed to be rinciple filters but I end up replacing them once a week
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be rinciple filters and you cannot rinse them so I've had to purchase a total of I think 12 of them some from here and some from the store but they do work they do filter properly they just do not rinse out like they're supposed do I have to replace them pretty much weekly
customer_reviews.author: Supermaticshark

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Pump stops working within a few minutes of use with these filters. Checked to see if it was plugged and it wasn't- and filters were still clean. 100% positive I have the correct size. Went to the store to buy another brand and the those worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: jamigirl78

customer_reviews.title: Good filter for pumps that use Type B filters.
customer_reviews.text: These disposable paper filters work well in the Intext pump with built-in filter. Also works well in the Coleman pump or any I suppose that use a Type B filter. Inexpensive and easy to order in quantity for cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: Iatros

customer_reviews.title: Great filter for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but I have purchased a $20 filter from Leslie’s and found it to be a much better quality. But for 20 a cartridge it turns out to get very expensive. So I do purchase these for normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky the reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These filters have not been easy to clean, bought Walmart brand they work much better
customer_reviews.author: MzZgUnZz

customer_reviews.title: Durable filters
customer_reviews.text: These filter are very well made. The plastic on top and bottom keep the filter material in place even after many cleanings. Truly the best cartilage filters on the market.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lyerly

customer_reviews.title: These are made so much better than the generic
customer_reviews.text: After using both these and the off brand purchased at the big box store, I can honestly say, you get what you pay for! These are made so much better than the generic. We always battle with getting the iron out of our well water when we fill our pool - these clear it in half the time! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: these were the correct fit and everything we needed for our pool filter...it was hard to find the size and quantity for the price i found from here....exactly what we were looking for...family approved
customer_reviews.author: stephanie scheliga / ATribeCalledFam

customer_reviews.title: its a pool filter
customer_reviews.text: It does what a pool filter is supposed to I guess, usually I use these for a few months just rinsing them out with a hose every couple of weeks so one tends to last me a whole season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool filters
customer_reviews.text: These are very good heavy duty filters . The original filters I had gotten with my pool would collapse and these do not . Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE BARRIER

customer_reviews.title: Just as described filters
customer_reviews.text: Filters came 100% intact (no dents or rips). They are easy to replace in the pump we have and they last about a week. For the price I do wish they lasted longer but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These filters fit perfectly, they are high quality, and they clean all the crap out of my pool. I have even been able to rinse them out a couple of times. I will be ordering some of these again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott White

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not quite a perfect fit for the Colman pools but it will fit if forced in. Seems better quality than the Colman filters.
customer_reviews.author: Venomous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive
customer_reviews.text: These filters are much more expensive than than the C filters. Don't understand why, but to change them every 2 weeks, that runs in to a lot of money each summer. They filter just ok, not great but if you need them, you're kinda stuck.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my filter pump. Great price too for three. I went to my local pool store and just one filter of these is between $20-$30 so it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tony V

customer_reviews.title: Better value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to department stores these filters are sturdy and hold up better. The cost was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Confer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for three Intex Type-B filters for our intex above ground 24 X 52 Prism Frame Pool. Highly recommend value for three filters to be stocked up.
customer_reviews.author: bzamora97

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Were falling apart almost out of the packages. One time use of a couple days and blue top had fallen apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For the money this 3 filter pack is great to keep my pool clean for the summer. They clean great. We rotate and clean and it's working wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good filters
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected... Excellent... Price was average... I clean filter daily so they last longer than 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it....
customer_reviews.text: Great little pack of three, save some money in long run if u just buy like 3 Or 4 of these depending on how big your pool is and how much u use it....
customer_reviews.author: Gh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find these anywhere in locals stores so I had no choice but to find them online. Great deal for the money and happy to find them
customer_reviews.author: tracy benton

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Work great at a decent price, rotated and cleaned them, easily made it through swimming season. I'm sure we will be able to use them again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: We do have to pull this out and hose it off because I guess we have a lot of dirt/pollen. They fit our pump and do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Qu Schmick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed to be made better than the ones I have been buying at Walmart, however, it only works for about an hour...it clogs up very quickly, have to keep taking it out to wash.Will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Richard

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than the cheap Walmart filters, but well worth the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is a three pack available. These filters are so nice and thick and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great filters
customer_reviews.text: Great price, plus I didn't have to go to the store to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, simple to clean. Fits my intex pump perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: aka.decoy

customer_reviews.title: Definitaly cheep
customer_reviews.text: They are dirty in three days and make my filter stop filtering. Found a better brand
customer_reviews.author: jamis m.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Worth the few extra dollars over the off brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Higgins

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: works well in our 2500 GPH pump. This is the second filter on my system, so if I keep it washed out it tends to last me over 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: TODD A DEBORD

customer_reviews.title: Product wasn't damaged
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough...simple purchase and came early. I wasnt aware there were different 'B' filters.They are slightly different than what came with my pool (with B filters). You have to smush it a bit. I wouldnt reorder this. Though it seems to be working, I just dont like that the fit is off.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha  Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for reuse
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I just hose them off really well and dry and reuse on a cycle.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy This brand
customer_reviews.text: The NON- Intex brands DO NOT FIT correctly. Save yourself some aggravation and buy the Intex brand
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great Price ,and made by Intex !
customer_reviews.text: great price! i have seen these go for 9.99 ea. and these are made by Intex, I usally rinse them and reuse them ,when i feel the water pressure is slowing down.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Quality filters
customer_reviews.text: These things are fairly easy to clean and get the job Done!!
customer_reviews.author: AMCand2boys

customer_reviews.title: Horrible price
customer_reviews.text: Far too expensive ! I get supply and demand but this is ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Benton

customer_reviews.title: Best ive found
customer_reviews.text: Good filters, hold up better than the cheaper Walmart version, they didn't hold up to my 2500 gpm pump they would collapse

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed for our pool
customer_reviews.text: I like the package deal. Quick easy shipping and perfect so I'm not having to go to the store all the time

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and terrible for the earth
customer_reviews.text: Clogs up fast .. go for the one that is reusable
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great filters for my above ground pool. Rinse them out with the hose twice a week. These 3 last me all summer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in terrible shape
customer_reviews.text: These things arrived all bent up. I had to use them but it convince me to go to a sand pump. Just to be fair Wal Mart,s filters looked the same that is why I ordered them Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MS Delta

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water clean
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I clean them once a week to get the most out of them:

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: We use basket socks to catch most of the debris. The filters last longer.

customer_reviews.title: Better quality
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than the junk you buy at Walmart. The inner body makes it easier to press down and I stall in pump.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice filters really worth the money. Not at all flimsy like Department store brand.

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This filter is good for the price. you can find better quality but more expensive. If use this filter change it maximum every 5 days.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these were eaxtly what we needed cause we couldn't find these in the store

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Trick
customer_reviews.text: The size B filters you sent are not even close to the size B filters people want and need, and I'm pretty sure you know that. This was a nasty case of bait and switch that cost us time and money to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Duane D Hem

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Did the job it was purchased for. Will order more.

customer_reviews.title: Good filters
customer_reviews.text: Good filters for our above ground pool. They arrived when was told they would. I would/will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: These work great! I have ordered multiple times and will order ...

customer_reviews.title: better than walmart brand
customer_reviews.text: These filters are sturdier and seem to filter smaller/ finer particles than the filters purchased at Walmart. Definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Godbout

customer_reviews.title: Gotta be price gouging...
customer_reviews.text: The pool filters work fine, but I can't understand why I ordered these in april for $25, and now in August they're priced at a whopping $70 for THREE filters. Price gouging at it's finest...
customer_reviews.author: james e little

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I can buy this pack of 3 for the same cost of 1 at my local pool store. This is such a great deal and they work wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: The description clearly states 3 pack. I opened my package and there were only two. Making the price for an individual filter $28.00. This is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: cara Malone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and takes a while before you have to change it out !

customer_reviews.title: Keep filters clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Seem to work better then the others

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact product I needed. I was glad I was able to order it from Amazon and the price was great too.

customer_reviews.title: A must have and 3 at that for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the easiness of putting in pump. Works great

customer_reviews.text: Great product just what I needed the stores always run out of these can always rely on amazon!

customer_reviews.text: 3 B Size filters as advertised. Fit right into my Intex Filter pump.

customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. If the product was cheaper than Walmart than I give it a 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Good filters
customer_reviews.text: We had ordered a product but then we had decided to upgrade our pump system for our swimming pool therefore we no longer needed the three filters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice filters- not nearly as reusable as other filters- but they do work nicely in our pump!

customer_reviews.title: When opening the pool we used all of the filters ...
customer_reviews.text: When opening the pool we used all of the filters fast. We bought a sand filter pump instead - the cost will balance after a summer season.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This filter was just what we needed. Price was great and the filters really lasted. They were easy to clean and reuse a few times. Will definitely repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like?! Perfect condition, great price, delivered on time

customer_reviews.text: upgraded my 15 ft. summer waves pool pump these filters are great! great price!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Good filter. Cleanable with a hose
customer_reviews.text: Good filter. Cleanable with a hose. Replace after a few cleanings. Does it's job. It even trapped pollen.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to return these for 3 weeks now! They wont except my reason why!! Wrong size way to big! My B is much smaller! Anyone have a # for me to call?

customer_reviews.title: False advertising in the description.
customer_reviews.text: The description of the type B pool filter says they will last up to two weeks.. they only last 2 days before they have to be replaced.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not order these. They get plugged up after 30 min or so and we tried rinsing them off to reuse them and they will not clean up at all. Order the Unicel C-5315, that filter is awesome! It is not made of the same material and is much more durable & reusable than the Intel ones. I will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: PNW Momma

product_meta.title: Intex B00LCIR3VS Pool Easy Set Type B Replacement Filter Pump Cartridge (3 Pack), 1 Pack, White
product_meta.description: The Intex type B model 59905 filter cartridge fits the Intex Wet set, easy set, frame set, & sun & sand pools & the Intex Krystal Klear filter pump units
feature_bullets: Lasts up to 2 weeks with normal use.
Fits Intex filter and pump unit models 633, 56611, 56621, 56631, & 58621.
Fits Krystal Klear pump models 51, 51R, 520 and 520R.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars987 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
